MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Char_Desc_80: Java Web Services framework that accepts REST, SOAP, JSON-RPC and XML-RPC.
English.Char_Desc_250: XINS is a Web Services framework. APIs are defined in a simple XML format. Then the specifications in HTML, the WSDL file, the Java client and server side code are generated from the specifications. APIs accept SOAP, REST, XML-RPC, JSON and more.
English.Char_Desc_450: XINS is a Web Services framework. APIs are defined in a simple XML format. Then the specifications in HTML and OpenDocument format, the test forms, the WSDL, the Java client and Java server side code are generated from the specifications. APIs accept SOAP, REST, XML-RPC, Yahoo! JSON, JSON-RPC and more. Java, PHP, Perl and Ajax client examples are provided. XINS has also commands to generate unit tests, stubs or to run the API.
English.Char_Desc_2000: XINS is a Web Services framework. XINS is a technology used to define, create and invoke remote APIs. APIs are defined in a simple XML format. Then the specifications in HTML and in OpenDocument format, the test forms, the WSDL included the XML Schema, the Java client and server side code are generated from the specifications. APIs accept SOAP, REST, XML-RPC, Yahoo! JSON, JSON-RPC and more. Java, PHP, Perl and Ajax examples are provided. XINS has also command to generate unit tests, stubs or to run the API. XINS main focus is simplicity and usability.
